huffman_coder module

class huffman_coder.HuffmanCoderTest(methodName='runTest')

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

NUM_SAMPLES = 10000
test_huffman_coding_dyadic()

On dyadic distributions Huffman coding should be perfectly equal to entropy 1. Randomly generate data with the given distribution 2. Construct Huffman coder using the given distribution 3. Encode/Decode the block

class huffman_coder.HuffmanTree(prob_dist: core.prob_dist.ProbabilityDist)

Bases: compressors.prefix_free_compressors.PrefixFreeTree

static build_tree(prob_dist: core.prob_dist.ProbabilityDist) → huffman_coder.HuffmanNode

Build the huffman coding tree

  1. Sort the prob distribution, combine last two symbols into a single symbol

  2. Continue until a single symbol is left
